articles.title: Apple apologizes after 'really disturbing' iPad ad sparks backlash - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: The Cupertino tech giant pulled the ad, which featured the wanton destruction of creative tools.
articles.content:
A hydraulic press crushes an array of creative instruments in an Apple ad that has been pulled from television.
Apple/Associated Press
Apple has apologized after facing backlash over a new iPad Pro… [+2947 chars]
